titles: An exact relation of the bloody and barbarous massacre at Bolton in the moors in Lancashire, May 28 by Prince Rupert being penned by an eye-vvitnesse, admirably preserved by the gracious and mighty hand of God in that day of trouble.
author: Eye-witnesse admirably preserved by the gracious and mighty hand of God in that day of trouble.
publisher: Printed by R. W. for Christopher Meredith,
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
